title: RIOTS GIVING FALSE PUINSHMENTS TO PLAYERS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: AFTER MY LAST RANKED GAME I JUST PLAYED, WHICH MY TEAM WON BY THE WAY, I GET A MESSAGE SAYING IVE BEEN PUNISHED FOR AFK AND BEEN PUT INTO A LOW PRIORTY QUEUE NOW BEFORE EVERY MATCH I HAVE TO WAIT 20 MINUTES BEFORE  I CAN PLAY SERIOUSLY WTF, IM PRETTY SURE I HAVENT GONE AFK IN ANY OF MY MATCHES HAVE A LOOK AT MY MATCH HISTORY, YET WHY IS RIOT BEING PREDIGESTS TOWARDS ME , IF THERE DOING THIS TO ME, WHOS TO SAY THEY ARNT INTENTIONALLY GIVING OTHER PLAYERS FALSE PUNISHMENTS, I NEVER GO AFK, MAYBE ONCE OR TWICE WHEN IVE GOTTEN ABSOLUTLEY FED WITH THE GAME,  I DONT RAGE OR BE TOXIC TO OTHER PLAYERS, YET ALMOST EVERY MONTH I GETTING FALSE PUISHMENTS FROM RIOT, THATS ALL I HAVE TO SAY.

replies.body:
If you were in their situation then you would fully understand, otherwise normally you would just think that these people are assholes and they intentionally leave games. 
Even if they managed to reconnect after they've crashed before the game ended, they would STILL GET the leaver buster penalty, or if able to reconnect at all.

What he's saying is true. There are a lot of people leave unintentionally because their games crashed and they could not reconnect. One of my friends also has the 20 minutes penalty for 5 games and keeps getting it, which is very unfair because the person never leave intentionally and especially when their games crashed they could NOT reconnect.
